snippet.title: Fundamentals of AI Agents | Rakesh Gohel
snippet.description:
Want to build AI Agents that scale??

Join me for my new cohort next year: https://maven.com/rakeshgohel/ai-agent-engineering-react-rag-multi-agent?utm_campaign=NjQ4MjYx&utm_medium=clp_share_link&utm_source=instructor&promoCode=FAST25

If you're serious about AI Agents, understanding these fundamentals isn't optional; it's essential.

üìå Let me break down the 7 key concepts:

1\. Agents Under the Hood

AI Agents are not about just models and frameworks. They are more about:

- Agent Auth: Secure identity and access control
- Memory: Short-term and long-term context retention
- Tools: External APIs and function calling capabilities
- Frameworks: ReACT, Reflexion, LangGraph orchestration
- Model Routers: Dynamic model selection based on task
- Models: Foundation LLMs powering agent reasoning
- Infrastructure: Scalable deployment and execution environment

2\. SPAR Framework (Understanding an AI Agent)

- Sense: Understanding and processing inputs
- Plan: Strategic thinking and building execution plans
- Act: Generating responses and taking actions
- Reflect: Self-correction and learning from errors

Learn more here: https://www.linkedin.com/posts/rakeshgohel01_ai-agents-fail-when-you-skip-the-steps-that-activity-7379493573202804736-TIl5?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop&rcm=ACoAADbIlqoBXsMJDd5Rmp0n6hdlqpbGlM-mkP4

3\ 3M's of Governance

- Map: Document agent capabilities and workflows
- Measure: Track performance, accuracy, and compliance
- Manage: Continuous monitoring and optimization

4\ 5P's of Guardrails

- Protocols: Standardized operating procedures
- Pre-Check: Input validation before processing
- Permissions: Access control and authorization
- Post-Check: Output validation and safety checks
- Protection: Security layers and risk mitigation

Learn more here: https://www.linkedin.com/posts/rakeshgohel01_your-ai-agents-are-only-as-strong-as-the-activity-7391475341669666816-AVbT?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop&rcm=ACoAADbIlqoBXsMJDd5Rmp0n6hdlqpbGlM-mkP4

5\ Building Agents is 90% Software Engineering

- 90% requires solid software architecture, testing, and deployment
- 10% is AI-specific logic and prompt engineering

Enterprise agents demand production-grade code quality

6\ Agents Scale with Proper Context Engineering

- Building without context = limited scalability
- Understanding and implementing context = true scalability

Proper knowledge management separates working demos from production systems

7\ Most Popular Use Cases

Learn more here: https://www.linkedin.com/posts/rakeshgohel01_ai-agent-trends-have-drastically-changed-activity-7383841580014723072-PxZp?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop&rcm=ACoAADbIlqoBXsMJDd5Rmp0n6hdlqpbGlM-mkP4

These concepts form the backbone of every scalable enterprise AI agent system.

Understanding theory is one thing, applying it with an enterprise mindset to build production-ready agents is another, 

and that's exactly what my AI Agent Engineering course will enable you to do.

Save üíæ ‚ûû React üëç ‚ûû Share ‚ôªÔ∏è
